content.full_text: Abraham Lincoln to Thomas T. Gantt, 5 February 18411
paragraphs: Abraham Lincoln to Thomas T. Gantt, 5 February 18411

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln wrote the letter and the address on page two.

2Thomas T. Gantt’s note of January 30, 1841, is not extant.  Lincoln’s payment was
                  presumably for legal services, but the exact nature of the transaction remains unknown.
